19 May 1953
To Members of the Board of Directors
of the MSB
Dear Colleagues
The University of Chicago Bookstore is putting on a big
window display in the next week or two to promote the
NAEB*s first publication. The Jeffersonian Heritage,
They are tying this in with a display of the record
album of the Jefferson series to make an attractive and
effective promotional window.
